Rice (Chawal).tips: Transplant 18-22 day old seedlings at 15x10cm spacing. Maintain 5cm water level. Treat seeds with Azospirillum. Apply zinc sulphate 0.5% if deficient

Maize (Corn/Makka).tips: Spacing: 60x25cm. Seed rate: 20-25 kg/ha. Treat seeds with Carbofuran + Carbendazim + Azospirillum. Irrigate at critical stages: knee-high, tasseling, grain filling

Chickpea (Gram/Chana).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 30-70 kg/ha based on seed size. Treat with Rhizobium 200g/8kg + PSB. One irrigation at pod initiation. Sow in October

Kidney Beans (Rajma).tips: Spacing: Bush type 45x10cm, Vine type 60x15cm. Seed depth: 3-4cm. Plant after last frost. Provide trellis for vine varieties. Water regularly but avoid waterlogging

Pigeon Peas (Tur/Arhar).tips: Spacing: 60x20cm. Seed rate: 15-20 kg/ha. Inoculate with Rhizobium + PSB. Irrigate at branching (30 DAS), flowering (70 DAS), podding (110 DAS)

Moth Beans (Matki).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 12-15 kg/ha. Drought tolerant. Grows well in arid regions. Light irrigation at flowering improves yield

Mung Bean (Green Gram/Moong).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 15-20 kg/ha. Seed treatment with FIR method (Fungicide-Insecticide-Rhizobium). Light irrigation at germination, flowering, pod formation

Black Gram (Urad).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 15-20 kg/ha. Inoculate seeds with Rhizobium + PSB culture. One or two irrigations at flowering and pod development

Lentil (Masoor).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 30-40 kg/ha. Inoculate with Rhizobium leguminosarum. Avoid waterlogging. One irrigation at flowering if needed

Pomegranate (Anar).tips: Spacing: 2.5-3m. Drip irrigation recommended. Apply micronutrients (Zn, B, Fe) through fertigation. Prune regularly. Fruit bagging prevents pest damage

Banana (Kela).tips: Spacing: 1.8x1.8m. Use suckers or tissue culture plants. Mulch heavily. Irrigate regularly. Desuckering and propping required. Bunches ready 100-150 days after flowering

Mango (Aam).tips: Spacing: 10x10m. Grafted plants preferred. Foliar spray of KNO3 1-2.5% for flower induction. Spray micronutrients as needed. Prune after harvest

Grapes (Angoor).tips: Spacing: 3x3m (pandal), 3x1.5m (bower). Pruning twice a year. Drip irrigation essential. Apply GA3 25 ppm + Brassinosteroid 0.5 ppm for fruit development

Watermelon (Tarbooz).tips: Spacing: 2.5x0.9m or 1.5x0.6m for drip. Seed rate: 3.5 kg/ha. Spray Ethrel 250 ppm 4 times from 15 DAS for more female flowers. Irrigate regularly

Muskmelon (Kharbuja).tips: Spacing: 2x1.5m or 1.5x0.6m. Seed rate: 2-2.5 kg/ha. Pinching of vine tips encourages branching. Irrigate at flowering and fruiting. Mulching beneficial

Apple.tips: Spacing: 4-6m. Grafted plants on rootstocks. Requires cold climate (1000-1500 chill hours). Prune in winter. Thinning of fruits essential. Hand pollination may be needed

Orange (Santra).tips: Spacing: 6x6m. Spray Zinc sulphate 0.5%, Manganese 0.05%, Iron 0.25% at new flush. Apply agricultural lime 4 kg/tree every 2-3 years in acidic soils

Papaya (Papita).tips: Spacing: 2x2m. Seed rate: 250-300g/ha. Select 1 male per 10 female plants. Irrigate frequently. Mulching reduces weeds. Fruits ready 6-8 months after flowering

Coconut (Nariyal).tips: Spacing: 7.5x7.5m (triangular). Plant during monsoon. Intercrops: banana, cocoa, pepper. Basin irrigation or drip. Remove dried fronds. Husk burial improves moisture

Cotton (Kapash).tips: Spacing: 60-90x30-45cm. Seed rate: 10-12 kg/ha. Treat seeds with fungicide + insecticide + micronutrients. Irrigate at critical stages. Gap filling within 10 days

Jute.tips: Spacing: 30x7-10cm (line sowing). Seed rate: 5-6 kg/ha. Requires warm humid climate, 5-8cm weekly rainfall. Harvest when 50% plants flower. Retting takes 15-20 days

Coffee.tips: Spacing: varies by region. Requires 1500-2500mm rainfall. Shade management essential. Mulching with coffee husk/leaves. Remove suckers. Prune after harvest

Barley (Jau).tips: Spacing: 22.5cm row spacing. Seed rate: 100 kg/ha. Sow at optimum time. Irrigate at CRI, tillering, jointing, flowering, milk stage. Light soils preferred

Sunflower (Surajmukhi).tips: Spacing: 60x30cm. Seed rate: 8-10 kg/ha. Sow at 4-5cm depth. Critical irrigation stages: flowering and seed filling. Drain excess water. Harvest at physiological maturity

Sweet Potato (Shakarkandi).tips: Spacing: 60x30cm. Use healthy vine cuttings 25-30cm long. Plant on ridges. Earthing up at 30 DAS. Irrigate at critical stages. Harvest when leaves turn yellow

Soybean (Soyabean).tips: Spacing: 45x5cm. Seed rate: 70-80 kg/ha. Inoculate with Rhizobium + PSB. Two-three irrigations at critical stages. Harvest when 95% pods mature, leaves drop

Jowar (Sorghum).tips: Spacing: 45x15cm. Seed rate: 10-12 kg/ha. Thin to 2 plants/hill. Irrigate at tillering, flowering, grain filling. Bird protection needed during maturity

Potato (Aloo).tips: Spacing: 60x20cm. Seed rate: 25-30 quintals/ha. Plant 5-10cm deep. Earthing up at 25-30 DAS. Irrigate at 7-10 day intervals. Dehaulm 10-15 days before harvest

Turmeric (Haldi).tips: Spacing: 30x25cm. Seed rate: 2500 kg/ha rhizomes. Plant in raised beds. Mulch with green leaves. Irrigate regularly. Earthing up 40-45 DAS. Harvest when leaves dry

Moong (Mung Bean/Green Gram).tips: Same as Mung Bean - Spacing 30x10cm, seed rate 15-20 kg/ha. Light irrigation at critical stages

Onion (Pyaaz).tips: Spacing: 15x10cm. Transplant 6-8 week old seedlings. Light frequent irrigation. Stop irrigation 10-15 days before harvest. Harvest when tops fall and neck shrinks

Cabbage (Band Gobi).tips: Spacing: 45x45cm (early), 60x45cm (late varieties). Transplant 4-6 week seedlings. Frequent irrigation. Earthing up at 30 DAT. Harvest when heads firm

Ragi (Finger Millet/Nachni).tips: Spacing: 22.5x10cm. Seed rate: 10 kg/ha (transplanting), 40 kg/ha (direct seeding). Transplant 25-30 day seedlings. Irrigate at critical stages. Nutritious millet crop

Rapeseed (Sarson).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 4-5 kg/ha. Sow at optimum time for avoiding aphids. Irrigate at flowering and pod filling. Harvest when pods turn brown

Wheat (Gehun).tips: Spacing: 20-23cm row spacing. Seed rate: 100-125 kg/ha. Sow in Nov for timely, Dec for late sowing. Irrigate at CRI, tillering, jointing, flowering, milking, dough stages

Horse Gram (Kulthi).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 25-30 kg/ha. Drought tolerant crop. Suitable for poor soils. One or two irrigations if available. Harvest when pods mature

Coriander (Dhania).tips: Spacing: 30x10cm. Seed rate: 15-20 kg/ha. Soak seeds 24 hrs before sowing. Light irrigation at 10-15 day intervals. Harvest when seeds turn brown

Tomato (Tamatar).tips: Spacing: 60x45cm (determinate), 75x60cm (indeterminate). Transplant 4-5 week seedlings. Staking/trellising required. Drip irrigation + fertigation recommended

Brinjal (Eggplant/Baingan).tips: Spacing: 75x60cm or 60x60cm. Transplant 5-6 week seedlings. Remove diseased plants. Harvest fruits at tender stage every 3-4 days. Long harvest period

Garlic (Lehsun).tips: Spacing: 15x10cm. Plant healthy cloves 2-3cm deep. Requires cool season. Light irrigation at regular intervals. Stop irrigation 2 weeks before harvest. Cure bulbs after harvest

Cardamom (Elaichi).tips: Spacing: 2x2m or 2x1m (high density). Plant during monsoon. Requires shade (50%). Mulching essential. Remove dried leaves. Harvest capsules at right maturity

Black Pepper (Kali Mirch).tips: Spacing: 2-3m. Plant as cuttings near support trees. Requires 2000-3000mm rainfall. Proper drainage essential. Mulching important. Apply micronutrients (Zn, B, Mo)

Bitter Gourd (Karela).tips: Spacing: 2x1.5m or 2x1m. Seed rate: 4-5 kg/ha. Provide pandal/trellis support. Pinching main vine encourages branching. Harvest tender fruits every 2-3 days

Lady Finger (Okra/Bhindi).tips: Spacing: 45x30cm (summer), 60x30cm (rainy). Seed rate: 20-25 kg/ha. Soak seeds 24 hrs before sowing. Harvest tender fruits every 2-3 days for continuous production

Pineapple (Ananas).tips: Spacing: 60x30cm (high density), 90x45cm (normal). Plant suckers/slips. Mulching with black plastic beneficial. Spray NAA 20ppm for uniform flowering

Bottle Gourd (Lauki).tips: Spacing: 2-3m between rows, 0.6-1m between plants. Provide pandal/trellis. Pinching after 6-7 leaves promotes branching. Harvest young fruits for better quality

Jackfruit (Kathal).tips: Spacing: 10-12m. Plant grafted seedlings. Mulching around base. Irrigation during dry periods. Remove water shoots. Fruits develop on trunk and branches

Pumpkin (Kaddu).tips: Spacing: 2-3m between rows, 0.6-1m in row. Seed rate: 4-5 kg/ha. Can be grown trailing on ground or on pandal. Harvest when skin hardens and fruit fully mature

Cauliflower (Phool Gobi).tips: Spacing: 45x45cm (early), 60x60cm (late). Transplant 4-6 week seedlings. Tie leaves over curd for blanching. Frequent irrigation. Harvest when curds compact and firm

Cucumber (Kheera).tips: Spacing: 1.5-2m between rows, 0.6-1m in row. Provide support or allow trailing. Frequent irrigation. Harvest tender fruits at marketable size every 2-3 days

Drumstick (Moringa/Sahjan).tips: Spacing: 2.5x2.5m. Plant seeds/cuttings. Annual variety: PKM 1, PKM 2 (60-90cm height, harvest after 90 days). Prune to maintain height. Multiple harvests possible

Radish (Mooli).tips: Spacing: 30x5-10cm (small), 45x10-15cm (large varieties). Seed rate: 8-12 kg/ha. Direct sowing. Thin seedlings after emergence. Frequent light irrigation. Harvest at right size
